[Hickson named to new quality, safety role](https://news.vumc.org/2013/07/18/hickson-named-to-new-quality-safety-role/) Jul. 18, 2013—Gerald Hickson, M.D., assistant vice chancellor for Health Affairs, associate dean for Faculty Affairs and the Joseph C. Ross Professor of Medical Education and Administration, is being promoted to the newly created position of senior vice president for Quality, Patient Safety and Risk Prevention.
